title: League not letting me log on
body:
Why is this happening it just says it keeps loading until timeout {{champion:32}} {{item:3073}}


> Back off~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Could you tell us how much longer this will take @Mindstar please
aLIRHGT WE BACK ONE AGAIN

replies.body:
UPDATE @ 11:30 AEST

Just a quick update to let you know we're still on the case.  Our engineers are making progress on the issue but it is not fully fixed yet.  I'll post another update when we have more info to share.

For those still affected by login issues, can you please post what ISP you connect with?

Cheers
Mindstar

Bigpond/Telstra

hopefully it's fixed soon

edit: 11.37 oh sht just logged in

> [{quoted}](name=yayo,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=x72ALJh3,comment-id=00230001,timestamp=2016-06-27T01:37:04.935+0000)
>
> Bigpond/Telstra
> 
> hopefully it's fixed soon

Mine is wroking im in game im on telstra

Thanks for letting me know.  It looks like we've managed to get everything fixed up, so let me know if there are any more issues.

Cheers
Mindstar
Belong/Telstra

Mindstar us the people of oce give u our strength we need u to use ur amazing mind and develop a spirit bomb Kappa
EVERYONE TRY NOW I JUST GOT INTO A NORMS MATCH

For now, sit tight.

Mindstar

Same :/
i cant log in at all wats going on
server froze up due to weather ayylmao
Same, first time in years i've woken up early to play before work and low and behold I can't login. Times out.

I got into a ranked game and immediately as i get into champ select i am first ban, i am unable to pick a champion and i am stuck in lobby for like a minute. I decided to close the client and now i am having the same problem, unable to log in
Exact same thing happened to me
infuriating because i was on 0 lp and now i'll have -3 :(
When will it come back on
I have no idea, it may take a while for riot to even take notice
PLEASE RIOT HELPPPPPPPPPPP! @RIOTGAMESOCE
im still having this problem I'm with spark
Time to play overwatch .
I can't login either what's happening?
@mindstar I lost one of my diamond promo games when the server just suddenly crashed in champ select, is there anything i could do not to lose that promo game?
I got in
